text: White Rock is a city in the Canadian province of British Columbia. It is in Metro Vancouver regional district. In 2021, 21,939 people lived in White Rock. The mayor of White Rock is Megan Knight. It is known for its pier and the large, white boulder which the city is named after. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:Settlements in Greater Vancouver
title: White Rock, British Columbia
